backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user registration, roles, and superadmin claiming with AccessControl integration and per-principal userId generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend changes, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including dashboards, auth pages, and routing behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme configuration defining color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manual router mapping pathname to page components with a custom 404 page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing the backend actor using Internet Identity and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that checks whether the user can create a task via an actor call.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/_shared/PageShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing gradient background, centered content, and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page with disabled Internet Identity and workspace login buttons.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form with disabled submit button and basic input fields.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard with static layout and disabled logout button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Asistenmu dashboard showing a static thank-you message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard that loads permission state via a query and enables or disables the task creation button.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard displaying a static appreciation message with disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard showing a static message about financial stability with disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Partner dashboard with a static growth message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Superadmin dashboard component with tabs, data formatting helpers, and user/masterdata/task management logic. Handles rendering summaries, lists, dialogs, and various admin operations.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Landing page for internal users with links to login and registration. Provides simple branding and navigation UI.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login flow using Internet Identity, role extraction, and superadmin claim checks. Handles authentication, navigation, and warnings.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Internal user registration form collecting identity and role info, submitting to backend via actor. Includes login/logout handling and success state.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering links for client and partner login and registration, plus internal access.
Static partner login page with disabled login options and navigation links. Provides basic UI for partner access.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Static partner registration form UI with disabled submission. Collects basic partner info fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters. Supports both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing current project state, required dashboard fixes, backend scope rules, and known issues for ongoing development.
